name: Bounce notification
description: Mailer daemon bounce - should not respond

trigger.subject: Delivery Status Notification (Failure)
trigger.body:
This is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification.

Delivery to the following recipient failed permanently:

     someone@invalid-domain.fake

Technical details of permanent failure:
Google tried to deliver your message, but it was rejected by the server for the recipient domain invalid-domain.fake by mail.invalid-domain.fake.

The error that the other server returned was:
550 5.1.1 The email account that you tried to reach does not exist.
